Website Disclaimer

Last Updated: November 25, 2025

PLEASE READ THIS DISCLAIMER CAREFULLY BEFORE USING THIS WEBSITE.

1. General Information and Educational Purpose Only

The information contained on this website, located at https://www.militarydisabilitynexus.com (the "Site"), including but not limited to text, graphics, images, videos, blog posts, downloadable resources, and other material (collectively, the "Content"), is provided for general informational and educational purposes only. The Content is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Nothing contained on this Site constitutes the practice of medicine, nursing, or any other professional healthcare service.

2. No Professional-Client Relationship

Your use of this Site, including your review of its Content, does not create a physician-patient, therapist-patient, attorney-client, or any other professional-client relationship between you and MAGLINC CONSULTANCY LLC, doing business as Military Disability Nexus (the "Company"), or any of its members, employees, or contracted professionals. A professional relationship with the Company is established only upon the mutual execution of a separate, written Professional Services Agreement.

3. Nature of Services and Critical Disclaimers

The Company provides strictly non-clinical, medicolegal consultative services to assist veterans and other eligible claimants in the preparation and strategic development of claims for disability benefits before the U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs (VA). By using this Site, you acknowledge and agree to the following fundamental disclaimers:

3.1. No Medical Treatment or Clinical Advice

The Company and its contracted U.S.-licensed physicians, nurse practitioners, and other clinicians DO NOT provide medical diagnosis, clinical treatment, therapeutic advice, prescriptions, or emergency medical services. Any medical opinions rendered (e.g., in Nexus Letters, Independent Medical Opinions, or completed Disability Benefits Questionnaires) are prepared solely for submission to the VA in support of a benefits claim and are not intended, designed, or suitable for any clinical treatment purpose or medical decision-making.

3.2. No Affiliation with Government Agencies

The Company is a privately-owned, independent entity. We are not affiliated with, endorsed by, sponsored by, or acting as an agent, representative, or employee of the U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs (VA), the Department of Defense (DoD), or any other federal or state government agency. The appearance of official VA forms or references to VA processes on this Site is for informational purposes only and does not imply such endorsement or affiliation.

3.3. No Guarantee of Results

The Company makes no representation, warranty, or guarantee, express or implied, regarding the success, approval, denial, specific disability rating percentage, or effective date of any VA claim. The final decision on any claim rests solely with the VA, which exercises its own discretion based on applicable laws, regulations, and the totality of evidence. Past performance or results described on this Site do not guarantee a similar outcome in your specific case.

4. Intellectual Property Notice

All Content on this Site, including the Company's name, logo, all designs, text, graphics, software, and the selection and arrangement thereof, is the proprietary property of the Company or its licensors and is protected by U.S. and international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to view and print the Content for your personal, non-commercial use, provided you do not modify or alter the Content in any way or remove any proprietary notices.

5. Limitation of Liability

To the fullest extent permissible by law, the Company, its members, employees, contractors, and affiliates shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from (a) your access to or use of or inability to access or use the Site; (b) any conduct or content of any third party on the Site; (c) any content obtained from the Site; and (d) unauthorized access, use, or alteration of your transmissions or content.

6. External Links and Third-Party References

The Site may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by the Company. The Company has no control over, and assumes no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services. You acknowledge and agree that the Company shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with the use of or reliance on any such content, goods, or services available on or through any such websites or services.

7. Governing Law and Jurisdiction

This Disclaimer and your use of the Site shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Wyoming, without regard to its conflict of law principles. Any legal action or proceeding arising under this Disclaimer or related to your use of the Site shall be brought exclusively in the federal or state courts located in Sheridan County, Wyoming, and you hereby irrevocably consent to the personal jurisdiction and venue of such courts.

8. Acknowledgement and Agreement

By continuing to access and use this Site, you hereby acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by the terms of this Disclaimer, as well as our Website Terms and Conditions, Privacy Policy, and Cookie Policy, which are incorporated herein by reference.

9. Contact Information

If you have any questions about this Disclaimer, please contact us at:
